summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4372 for the improvement of Graham Street from 47th Avenue South to 52nd Avenue South; by constructing sewers, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 51725, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
